bibdata.title: IEEE Draft Standard for a Protection Profile in Operational Environment C
IEEE Draft Standard for a Protection Profile in Operational Environment C
bibdata.docidentifier: IEEE Unapproved Draft Std P2600.3/D41b, Jan 09

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Standard for a Protection Profile for Hardcopy Devices in a public-facing environment in which document security is not guaranteed, but access control and usage accounting are important to the operator of the environment. A retail copy center, public library, Internet cafÂ¿, and hotel business center are typical applications of this environment. This environment will be known as &#34;Operational Environment C.&#34;

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
